svg.text: Vehicle-to-vehicle control system, as designed by U. Penn for Mobies. The controller in FollowingPlatoon is a modal controller with the objective of following the LeadingPlatoon.

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (dist - lambdaV * vel <= eup1+lambdaP) && (lambdaV*vel - dist <= epsE - eup1 - lambdaP)
